Headline: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line trains are standing with major delays at Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Brown Line trains are standing with major delays at Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area:

Brown Line shuttle buses are from Merchandise Mart to Southport

Red Line shuttle buses are from Wilson to North/Clybourn.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
